title: Jet
description: As the crowd cheers and the music blasts,I’m content to let my bandmates take center stage.They can steal the spotlight while I get lost in the thumping beats.There, in the shadows of our building fame,my secrets remain safely hidden, or so I thought.Quinn wants to uncover all of my pain.See every scar.Yet the ugly truth carved on my heart could be enough to drive her away.I didn’t want the world to know.But now my past has come back to haunt me.Will I lose the girl and my dream too, when everything I desperately tried to hide comes crashing down around me?Dive into the gritty world of rock-and-roll with Jet, the second installment of The Sinful Seven series, where the past and present collide!
author: Connie Lafortune
